code: /* eslint-disable no-param-reassign */import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={userName:null,userEmail:null,userId:null,userImage:null};var userSlice=createSlice({name:'user',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setActiveUser:function setActiveUser(state,action){state.userName=action.payload.userName;state.userEmail=action.payload.userEmail;state.userId=action.payload.userId;state.userImage=action.payload.userImage;},setUserLogoutState:function setUserLogoutState(state){state.userName=null;state.userEmail=null;state.userId=null;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,setActiveUser=_userSlice$actions.setActiveUser,setUserLogoutState=_userSlice$actions.setUserLogoutState;export{setActiveUser,setUserLogoutState};export var selectUserName=function selectUserName(state){return state.user.userName;};export var selectUserEmail=function selectUserEmail(state){return state.user.userEmail;};export var selectUserId=function selectUserId(state){return state.user.userId;};export var selectUserImage=function selectUserImage(state){return state.user.userImage;};export default userSlice.reducer;
